# Chapter 5: Dimensionality reduction techniques

# Data Wrangling

Dataset Description: 

195 Observations, 19 Variables

"The 'human' dataset originates from the United Nations Development Programme." http://hdr.undp.org/en/content/human-development-index-hdi

Meta data file for the modified data - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TuomoNieminen/Helsinki-Open-Data-Science/master/datasets/human_meta.txt

```{r}
human <- read.csv("data/human.csv", sep = ",")
dim(human)
str(human)
```
